summary:
SUMMARY:
Currently I am assigned to Fugitive Operations Team (FUGOPS). My duties include but are not limited to; running data base checks in several government systems in support of the FUGOPS team officers, process bond I am the bond expert for my office , field phone calls from detainee attorneys, compiling arrest stats for the Deputy Field Office Director (DFOD) as well as a ICE headquarters. Research detainee history using multiple sources to establish identity/citizenship and manage detained and non-detained dockets. Summarize and tabulate detainee information from various reports, utilizing a variety of databases and automated systems. Generate and verify reports, encounters, charging documents, studies, data quality and create and revise spreadsheets, charts, graphs, and presentations. 

Key Qualifications

Small Team Tactics

Expert in Weapons Proficiency

Personal Security

Conflict Resolution

Self Motivated

Time Management

EXPERIENCE:
Provided close-in personal protection for high ranking clients to and from locations.

Trained and supervised the Iraqi army which was a force multiplier that increased the combat capability of companies.

Adept at resolving personal security matters quickly and effectively, yet persistent in pursuing the most effective and appropriate course of action.

COMMUNICATION
Communicated effectively within diversified demographics.

Expertly identified the needs and rapidly delivered comprehensible information.

Developed and maintained positive operational relationships.

OPERATIONS
Selected over peers to be a part of the Army's oldest active Infantry Regiment, The Old Guard at Arlington National Cemetery.

Conducted over 400 Funeral missions in Arlington national cemetery.

Conducted 15 General Officer funerals, ten Full honor military arrivals, five Presidential and Foreign dignitary cordons, five wreathÂ layingÂ at The Tomb of the Unknown soldiers and was Security and participant of the Presidential Inauguration of 2012.Â

educations.degree: working on bachelor of science in criminal Justice administration

headline: DHS/ICE/ERO
